error.resource_error: Could not update rest data. Verify your configuration

data.name: Name
data.select: Select, find or find string argument

data_description.attribute: Get value of an attribute on the selected tag
data_description.device_class: The type/class of the sensor to set the icon in the frontend
data_description.index: Defines which of the elements returned by the CSS selector to use
data_description.select: Defines what tag to search for. Check Beautifulsoup CSS selectors for details
data_description.unit_of_measurement: Choose temperature measurement or create your own
data_description.value_template: Defines a template to get the state of the sensor
data_description.search_type: Search via select, find or find string

data_description.authentication: Type of the HTTP authentication. Either basic or digest
data_description.headers: Headers to use for the web request
data_description.resource: The URL to the website that contains the value
data_description.verify_ssl: Enables/disables verification of SSL/TLS certificate, for example if it is self-signed

moved_yaml.description:
Configuring Scrape using YAML has been moved to integration key.

Your existing YAML configuration will be working for 2 more versions.

Migrate your YAML configuration to the integration key according to the documentation.
moved_yaml.title: The Scrape YAML configuration has been moved
